properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 8 at 4:18AM AKST until February 10 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Winds gusting as high as
30 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow reducing
the visibility to one half mile or less at times. Total snow
accumulations of 1 to 3 inches expected.

* WHERE...Northeastern Brooks Range, mainly near passes.

* WHEN...Midnight to 6 AM Monday.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and blowing snow means periods
of snow and blowing snow will cause travel difficulties. The
latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 AM AKST MONDAY
